title: Fasst Flexx Alloy weighs in heavier, more affordable suspension handlebar for MTB
content:
UK distributors Cyclorise have announced the addition of an alloy version of Fasst Company’s ground-breaking suspension handlebar, the Fasst Flexx Enduro and DH. The material update makes these eye-wateringly expensive MTB bars $100 cheaper than their carbon counterpart, now priced at $324.99.
